headline: Notebook Primer: John Carpenter
description: From horror to comedies to Westerns, an overview of the career of one of Hollywood's great genre filmmakers.

headline: Review: ‘Antlers’
description: Director Scott Cooper's first foray into horror, Antlers, opens everywhere tomorrow. Critic Andrew Wyatt has a review:

headline: Free Form
description: Ella Kemp chats to Léa Seydoux about Wes Anderson’s “little troupe” and baring it all.

headline: One Good Motherf**ker
description: An exclusive excerpt from a new book about the life and work of Samuel L. Jackson.

headline: Fårö and Away
description: Bergman Island filmmaker Mia Hansen-Løve on all things Bergman.
